prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that floats with a spooky aura and can disappear at will.
Show me a balloon-like Pokemon with a round body and colorful limbs ready for a festival.
Imagine a dual-type Pokemon that haunts the night skies, featuring a blend of purple and yellow colors.
Design a whimsical Pokemon with a friendly demeanor and a knack for surprising its trainers.
Give me a Pokemon that resembles a flying balloon, adorned with a quirky face and playful colors.
Make a Pokemon that guides lost souls with its ethereal presence, showcasing a unique shape and color scheme.
Generate a mysterious Pokemon that drifts through the air, featuring a patchwork of colors and cheerful features.
